effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Catches a wild Pokémon without fail.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Catches a wild Pokémon every time.

salvaje y no falla nunca.

Used in battle

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A tool used for
catching wild
POKéMON.

A tool used for
catching wild
POKéMON.

A BALL thrown to catch a wild
POKéMON. It is designed in a
capsule style.

A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It is thrown like a ball at the target.
It is designed as a capsule system.

A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It is thrown like a ball at the target.
It is designed as a capsule system.

A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It is thrown like a ball at the target.
It is designed as a capsule system.

Un objet pareil à une capsule, qui
capture les Pokémon sauvages. Il suffit
pour cela de le jeter comme une balle.

A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It is thrown like a ball at the target.
It is designed as a capsule system.

A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It is thrown like a ball at the target.
It is designed as a capsule system.

やせいの　ポケモンに　なげて
つかまえる　ための　ボール。
カプセルしきに　なっている。

야생 포켓몬에게 던져서
잡기 위한 볼.
캡슐식으로 되어 있다.

Un objet semblable à une capsule, qui capture
les Pokémon sauvages. Il suffit pour cela de le
jeter comme une balle.

Damit fängst du wilde Pokémon. Du wirfst ihn wie
einen normalen Ball. Das Design ähnelt dem einer
Kapsel.

Dispositivo con diseño capsular que atrapa
Pokémon salvajes. Se lanza como una bola
contra el blanco.

Strumento dotato di capsula usato per catturare
Pokémon selvatici. Si lancia contro il bersaglio
come una palla.

A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It’s thrown like a ball at a Pokémon,
comfortably encapsulating its target.

カプセル式に　なっている。

effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1.5×.

This item can only be used in the great marsh or kanto safari zone.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon in the Great Marsh or Safari Zone.  Success rate is 1.5×.

カントーちほうの　サファリゾーンや
シンオウちほうの　だいしつげんで
つかわれていた　とくべつな　ボール。

관동지방의 사파리존과
신오지방의 대습초원에서
사용되었던 특별한 볼.

曾在關都地區的狩獵地帶，
以及神奧地區的大濕地被使用。
是一種特殊的球。

Une Poké Ball spéciale anciennement utilisée
au Parc Safari de Kanto et au Grand Marais de Sinnoh.

Ein besonderer Ball, der in der Safari-Zone der
Kanto-Region und im Großmoor der Sinnoh-Region
eingesetzt wird.

Poké Ball especial que se utilizaba en lugares como
la Zona Safari de Kanto y el Gran Pantano de Sinnoh.

Poké Ball speciale usata in passato nella Zona Safari
di Kanto e nella Gran Palude di Sinnoh.

A special Poké Ball that was used in the Safari Zone
in the Kanto region and in the Great Marsh in the
Sinnoh region.

カントー地方の　サファリゾーンや
シンオウ地方の　大湿原で
使われていた　特別な　ボール。

曾在关都地区的狩猎地带
以及神奥地区的大湿地被使用。
是一种特殊的球。

Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Cures confusion.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A glass flute that
snaps POKéMON
out of confusion.

A glass flute that
snaps POKéMON
out of confusion.

A yellow glass flute that snaps one
POKéMON out of confusion.

A yellow flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of confusion.

A yellow flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of confusion.

A yellow flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of confusion.

Jouet en forme de flûte en verre
jaune. Les amateurs en donnent
un bon prix.

A toy flute made from yellow glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

A toy flute made from yellow glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

きいろい　ガラスで　できている
おもちゃの　ふえ。

노란 유리로 만들어진
장난감 피리.
Un jouet en forme de flûte en verre jaune.
Eine Spielzeugflöte aus gelbem Glas.
Una flauta de juguete de cristal amarillo.
Flauto giocattolo fatto di vetro giallo.

A lovely toy flute to admire.
It’s made from yellow glass.

黄色い　ガラスで　できている
おもちゃの　笛。

きいろのガラスで　できた　ふえ。
こんらん　じょうたいを
かいふくする。

노란 유리로 만들어진 피리.
혼란 상태를
회복한다.

以黃色玻璃製成的笛子。
可以治癒混亂狀態。

Un jouet en forme de flûte en verre jaune.
Soigne la confusion.

Eine Spielzeugflöte aus gelbem Glas.
Heilt Verwirrung.

Una flauta de cristal amarillo cuyas notas sacan a
un Pokémon de la confusión.

Flauto fatto di vetro giallo. Ha il potere di guarire
dalla confusione.

out of confusion.

effect_entries.short_effect: No effect. Gen III: Trade four and four Shoal Shells for a Shell Bell.

flavor_text_entries.text:
Salt obtained from
deep inside the
SHOAL CAVE.

Salt obtained from
deep inside the
SHOAL CAVE.

Pure salt obtained from deep inside
the SHOAL CAVE. It is extremely
salty.

Pure salt that was discovered deep
inside the Shoal Cave.
It is extremely salty.

Pure salt that was discovered deep
inside the Shoal Cave.
It is extremely salty.

Pure salt that was discovered deep
inside the Shoal Cave.
It is extremely salty.

Sel pur provenant des profondeurs
de la Grotte Tréfonds. Les amateurs
en donnent un bon prix.

Pure salt that can be discovered deep
inside the Shoal Cave.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

Pure salt that can be discovered deep
inside the Shoal Cave.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

あさせのほらあな　という　ばしょで
みつかる　きれいな　しお。

여울의 동굴이라는 장소에서
발견할 수 있는 깨끗한 소금.

Du sel pur provenant des profondeurs de
la Grotte Tréfonds.

Reine Salzkristalle, die sich in der Küstenhöhle
finden lassen.

Una sal muy fina encontrada en la Cueva
Cardumen.
Sale purissimo rinvenuto nella Grotta Ondosa.

Pure salt that can be discovered
only deep inside the Shoal Cave.

浅瀬の洞穴という　場所で
みつかる　きれいな　塩。

あさせのほらあなで
みつけた　しお。

여울의 동굴에서
발견한 소금.

在名為淺灘洞穴的地方
找到的海鹽。
Du sel provenant de la Grotte Tréfonds.

Reine Salzkristalle, die du in der Küstenhöhle
gefunden hast.

Una sal muy fina que se encuentra en la Cueva
Cardumen.
Sale rinvenuto nella Grotta Ondosa.
Salt that you found inside Shoal Cave.

浅瀬の洞穴で
みつけた　塩。

在浅滩洞穴这地方
找到的海盐。

effect_entries.effect: Trade one to the Move Relearner near the shore in pastoria city or with the Move Deleter in blackthorn city to teach one party Pokémon a prior level-up move.
effect_entries.short_effect: No effect. Can be traded for prior Level-up moves.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A lovely scale.
It is coveted by
collectors.

A lovely scale.
It is coveted by
collectors.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that
is extremely rare. It glows faintly
in the colors of a rainbow.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in the
colors of the rainbow.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in the
colors of the rainbow.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in the
colors of the rainbow.

Une jolie écaille en forme de cœur qui
est très rare. Elle brille légèrement
d’un éclat arc-en-ciel.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in the
colors of the rainbow.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in the
colors of the rainbow.

きれいな　ハートの　かたちの
とても　めずらしい　ウロコ。
にじいろに　うすく　かがやく。

예쁜 하트 모양의
무척 진귀한 비늘.
무지개색으로 연하게 반짝인다.

Une très rare et jolie écaille en forme de cœur.
Elle brille légèrement d’un éclat arc-en-ciel.

Eine hübsche, herzförmige und sehr seltene
Schuppe. Sie erstrahlt in den Farben
des Regenbogens.

Bella escama con forma de corazón que brilla
ligeramente como los colores del arcoíris. Es muy
poco común.

Squama graziosa, a forma di cuore e molto rara.
Riflette tutti i colori dell’iride.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly with
all of the colors of the rainbow.

きれいな　ハートの　形の
とても　珍しい　ウロコ。
にじ色に　うすく　輝く。

きれいな　ハートの　かたちの
とても　めずらしい　ウロコ。
わたすと　よろこぶ　ひともいる。

예쁜 하트 모양의
무척 진귀한 비늘.
받으면 좋아하는 사람도 있다.

有著美麗心形外形
且非常稀奇的鱗片。
有些人收到會很高興。

Une écaille très rare et jolie en forme de cœur.
Certaines personnes sont ravies quand on leur
en donne une.

Eine hübsche, herzförmige und sehr seltene
Schuppe. Damit könnte man so manchem eine
Freude machen.

Una bella y rara escama con forma de corazón que
más de uno apreciará si se la entregas.

Squama graziosa, a forma di cuore e molto rara.
Alcune persone sono molto felici di riceverne una.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is extremely
rare. Some people are happy to receive one.

きれいな　ハートの　形の
とても　珍しい　ウロコ。
渡すと　よろこぶ　人もいる。

有着美丽心形外形
且非常珍稀的鳞片。
有些人收到会很高兴。

きれいな　ハートの　かたちの
とても　めずらしい　ウロコ。
わたすと　よろこぶ　ひともいる。
